Poha

Description

Poha is a savory Indian breakfast made from flattened rice, spiced with turmeric, mustard seeds, and green chilies, then mixed with onions, peas, and crunchy peanuts. Topped with fresh coriander and a squeeze of lemon, it’s a light yet flavorful dish.

Ingredients

  • 1 cup flattened rice (poha)
  • 1 medium onion, finely chopped 1 green chili, chopped (adjust to taste) 1/4 teaspoon turmeric powder 1 teaspoon mustard seeds 8-10 curry leaves 2 tablespoons peanuts 1-2 tablespoons oil Salt, to taste Fresh coriander leaves, chopped (for garnish) Lemon wedge (for garnish)
  • 2 tablespoons of sugar
  • 1 teaspoon of salt
    • {/* Add more ingredients as needed */}

Procedure

  1. Step 1: Preheat the oven to 180°C (350°F).
  2. Step 2: Mix all dry ingredients in a bowl.
  3. Step 3: Add wet ingredients and mix until smooth.
    4. {/* Add more steps as needed */}
